text:
I was trying to find out just how to get the MetaData from a Single MS Office document. All I found so far was how to create a File System or Directory.

I am also trying to have a Function in Oracle Database that will take the File as the input (although ideally i would prefer that I can pass the Oracle BLOB or BFILE) and then get back a CLOB with the MetaData.

Can I do 

Java -jar <whatever> -file <input_file>
creator: amin_adatia@hotmail.com
